'''They Enter the Flow''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to take a picture of the [[Varuna Contraption|Varunastra]] when it starts up at either 00:00 or 12:00 in-game time.

==Gameplay Notes==
* Unlike what the description states, in order to get the achievement, the player must use the menu [[Photo Mode]] and not the Kamera or [[Special Kamera]].
* If the World Quest Series [[Varuna Gatha]] has been completed, the weather controls must be set on "circulate" in order for the Varunastra to activate.
